attributes.action: Freedom of speech and investigation needed
attributes.additional_details: How can the British public get answers if we not allowed to ask questions and if the public feels an investigation is needed how can it just be refused by just th pm
attributes.background: I'd like parlement to have a vote on the public being allowed an investigation into Dominic Cummins and Boris Johnsons behavior and ask for freedom of speech back

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular we're not sure what you would like an investigation into, or how you feel freedom of speech is being restricted.
                
You may wish to sign one of these petitions calling for a similar action:
Hold a Public Inquiry into the handling of the Covid-19 crisis:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302576

Public Inquiry into consistent enforcement of lockdown rules:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/322360
